name: LizardGen
description:
Discover thousands of randomly generated lizards. What more can you ask more? You can also take pictures of them! They also have randomized AI! They pick their behavior at the start and loop through it. I used something similar to a behavior tree nodes. There are also rare features you can find. If you discover any of the following, post the screenshot in the comments. No prizes or anything but even I couldn't find some of them (especially combinations of them)

Each of these criteria has %5 percent chance or less:

  • Two different eye colors
  • Two different pupil colors
  • Extremely big lizard (huge)
  • Extremely small lizard (smol)
  • Different sizes for both eyes
  • Glowing textures in both upper and lower body

Also here's a hunting challenge you do for fun:

  1. Find a huge lizard
  2. Find a smol lizard (Like super small)
  3. Find a lizard with glowing markers which changes color depending on your perspective
  4. Find a lizard that has two different eye colors
  5. Find a glowing half-transparent lizard
  6. Find a lizard with no tongue
  7. Find a half-transparent red lizard
  8. Find a lizard that has no texture (Only one plain color)

Have a Good hunt!

Made for #procjam and #secretsantajam
